title: Accurate and Interpretable Deep Learning Model for Sleep Staging in Children with Sleep Apnea from Pulse Oximetry

abstract: Identification of sleep stages is crucial in the diagnosis of sleep-related disorders but relies on the labor-intensive and manual scoring of overnight polysomnography (PSG) recordings. To simplify the sleep staging process, deep learning (DL) …
